titles.title: Have You Any Room For Jesus (easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Room for Jesus King of glory Hasten now His word obey Swing the heart's door widely open Bid Him enter while you may{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have you any room for Jesus He who bore your load of sin As He knocks and asks admission Sinner will you let Him in{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Room for pleasure room for business But for Christ the crucified Not a place that He can enter In the heart for which He died{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have you any room for Jesus As in grace He calls again O today is time accepted Tomorrow you may call in vain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Room and time now give to Jesus Soon will pass God's day of grace Soon thy heart left cold and silent And thy Savior's pleading cease{/lang-eng}
